name: FREE Up Some Space
description:
"Free Up Some Space" is a High-Score based Arcade Game about destroying buildings to Free Up Some Space. Play as giant gorilla captured and employed by a construction company that needs help destroying buildings being sold for free. Use a Ball and Chain in order to cause destruction and defeat mutated bananas.

WASD to Move

Shift to Sprint

Touch the ball to grab it

Use the Mouse to aim the ball and Left Click to throw the Ball into buildings

Press Q to retrieve the ball up to three times

Destroy enough buildings to continue to the next wave

Eat Bananas dropped by Mutated Bananas to restore Stamina

Maintain your Stamina to keep destroying buildings
